snippet: Grandparents may be well suited for teaching children about money, one accountant says, because they can talk more freely with their grandchildren, who also tend to open up to them.
abstract: Wealth Matters column; group of financial educators is advocating that grandparents give gift of financial awareness; say grandparents may be well suited for teaching children about money, able to talk more freely with their grandchildren, who also tend to open up to them.
lead_paragraph: Grandparents may be well suited for teaching children about money, one accountant says, because they can talk more freely with their grandchildren, who also tend to open up to them.

headline.print_headline: For Grandchildren, the Gift of Financial Awareness
